questionnaireanswer.question_text:
Have you ever had an allergic reaction to: 

(This would include a severe allergic reaction [e.g., anaphylaxis] that required treatment with epinephrine or EpiPen® or that caused you to go to the hospital. It would also include an allergic reaction that caused hives, swelling, or respiratory distress, including wheezing.)
options: A component of a COVID-19 vaccine, including either of the following: ○ Polyethylene glycol (PEG), which is found in some medications, such as laxatives and preparations for colonoscopy procedures
Polysorbate, which is found in some vaccines, film coated tablets, and intravenous steroids
A previous dose of COVID-19 vaccine

all.value: A component of a COVID-19 vaccine, including either of the following: ○ Polyethylene glycol (PEG), which is found in some medications, such as laxatives and preparations for colonoscopy procedures
Polysorbate, which is found in some vaccines, film coated tablets, and intravenous steroids
A previous dose of COVID-19 vaccine
